notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was part of the OVERLORD program (LABÉO) and therefore was funded by the IFCE (Institut Français du Cheval et de l’Equitation), grant number 2017-008; the Fonds Eperon, grant number N12-2017 and the Normandy Region Council, grant number 17E01598/17P04324 and CENTAURE European project co-funded by Normandy County Council, European Union in the framework of the ERDF-ESF operational program 2014–2020.
